instruction: Please provide an analysis of the recent market downturn in relation to different segments of global equity markets, including factor and sector indexes.
output: Despite an overall decline in global equity markets, the performance of different segments has varied. Defensive factor indexes, such as the MSCI Minimum Volatility Index and the MSCI Quality Index, have outperformed whereas the MSCI Equal Weighted Index and the MSCI Enhanced Value Index have underperformed. Similarly, defensive sectors like health care, utilities, and consumer staples have outperformed while energy, financials, and industrials have underperformed. Surprisingly, information technology, which is usually considered a cyclical sector, has performed well, bucking historical trends.
